ingredients: 1  seedless watermelon, halved and sliced, 3 cups water, 1 (15.25 ounce) can crushed pineapple, 1 (12 fluid ounce) can evaporated milk,   +   1/2 cup shredded coconut, 2 tablespoons white sugar, or to taste,   +   1/2  lime, juiced
nutrition: Total Fat 4g 5%, Saturated Fat 2g 12%, Cholesterol 9mg 3%, Sodium 48mg 2%, Total Carbohydrate 41g 15%, Dietary Fiber 2g 8%, Total Sugars 35g, Protein 5g, Vitamin C 35mg 176%, Calcium 117mg 9%, Iron 1mg 6%, Potassium 574mg 12%
